sources.title: 1961 - Five Golden Hours - The Escapades of a Merry Widow With a Credit Card at the Cemetery!
sources.description:
A con man named Aldo Bondi (Ernie Kovacs) takes advantage of rich widows for financial gain, but falls for the Baroness Sandra (Cyd Charisse). He becomes involved in a scheme involving the wealth of his widows and the time difference between Rome and New York City, but things become complicated when his relationship with Sandra doesn't go as expected.

Alternative title : Beware of Widows / The Widows' Lover (1961) 
Colorized version: film https://youtu.be/OYQ05Uasgjo

Director : Mario Zampi
Writer : Hans Wilhelm
Cast : Ernie Kovacs, Cyd Charisse

Genres: Romantic Comedy,  Crime
Release date: March 10, 1961 
Filming location: Bolzano, Italy

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

metadata.Plot: A petty crook gallantly consoles wealthy widows and is doing all right in his chosen profession until he meets and falls in love with a lovely baroness, who knows all about get-rich-quick schemes. The crook evolves an ingenious swindle geared to the time differential between New York and Rome and works it on his string of widows, but the baroness takes off with the dough. The crook flees to a mental home to escape the wrath of his victims.
metadata.Actors: Ernie Kovacs, Cyd Charisse, George Sanders
